answers.answer: There are many people who are misdiagnosed with CFS. In fact, I still have a link of a presentation that a physician from the CDC did on CFS. An alarming percentage of participants in one of their research studies were misdiagnosed with CFS.... one of them had diabetes !

question: Here is a link to an article on MSNBC about a person misdiagnosed with CFS by a "specialist"; I think it is unfortunate that happens too much...luckily this person eventually found the real cause of her problems.  http://today.msnbc.msn.com/id/25062810/
title: CFS Story/Article
